title: Handle Post-Event Guest Feedback
description: A guest sends an email after an event complaining about long lines for the restrooms.

tasks.description: Log the guest's feedback in the customer feedback system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new feedback record and categorizes it as 'Facility/Cleanliness'.

tasks.description: Draft a response to the guest, thanking them for their feedback and acknowledging their concern.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a polite and empathetic response.

tasks.description: Forward the feedback to the venue operations manager for their awareness and review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification to the operations manager.
